title: Conn Iggulden: "The Dangerous Book for Boys"
description: Michael's conversation with British author Conn Iggulden, co-author of "The Dangerous Book for Boys" from 2012. The book was published in 2005 and again in 2012.
author: podcasts@siriusxm.com (Michael Smerconish, Conn Iggulden)
